author: Pablo López
title: Starbucks y su colección inspirada en México son acusados de "hipocresía" y gentrificación
text:
Starbucks liberó recientemente una colección de San Valentín, la cual muchos se dieron a la idea de que estaba inspirada en México.
Esta colección de Starbucks de San Valentín parece que se inspira en los “milagritos”, los corazones de latón que tradicionales de San Miguel de Allende en México.
Al poco tiempo de darse a conocer los productos, la misma compañía confirmó que en efecto, tomaban como base los “milagritos” de San Miguel de Allende.
Sin embargo, hubo quienes calificaron de hipócritas y gentrificadores a estos nuevos coleccionables de la popular cafetería, dando a conocer su malestar en redes sociales.
La colección de Starbucks inspirada en México no agradó a todos
Tras la revelación de la colección de Starbucks de San Valentín inspirada en San Miguel de Allende, México, hubo ciertas críticas alrededor de todo el concepto.
En redes sociales señalaron que la colección de San Valentín de Starbucks, más que honrar a México, es una muestra de hipocresía y gentrificación.
Esto debido al uso de un elemento representativo de la cultura de México, con el único fin de generar ganancias para una empresa extranjera, que poco o nada se preocupa por el país.
Además de que Starbucks fue una de las compañías que estuvo de acuerdo con las políticas de Donald Trump en contra de la inclusión, diversidad y equidad.
Starbucks no ha mencionado la polémica por la colección inspirada en México
Más allá de dar a conocer el lanzamiento de la colección de San Valentín inspirada en México, Starbucks no ha dicho nada acerca de esta polémica.
Con esto Starbucks mantiene su discurso acerca de que la colección de San Valentín trata de conectar con las raíces de las comunidades en México.
Señalando que están muy orgullosos que los “milagritos” de San Miguel de Allende puedan ser conocidos y “viajar” por todo el mundo.
Por lo pronto, los coleccionables ya están disponibles en los Starbucks de México desde el pasado lunes 26 de enero de 2025.
“En Starbucks siempre buscamos conectar con las raíces de las comunidades a las que servimos todos los días, mientras celebramos la riqueza cultural de México y la creatividad de nuestros partners. Estamos muy orgullosos de que esta colección, inspirada en los corazones y milagritos de San Miguel de Allende, viaje por el mundo, permitiendo que más personas conozcan esta tradición tan especial que celebra el amor en todas sus formas.”
Bibiana Rosique, Directora de Mercadotecnia de Starbucks-Alsea
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

author: Aidan McGrath; December
title: Heat's Josh Richardson (back) out Thursday
text: Heat's Josh Richardson (back) out Thursday The Miami Heat have ruled out Josh Richardson (back) for Thursday's game against the Golden State Warriors. Richardson carried a doubtful tag into tonight's game due to a back injury, so it's not too surprising that he'll sit the game out. He's averaging 27.8 minutes per game for Miami this season. Richardson has averaged 10 points, 2.7 rebounds, and 3 assists per game for the Heat so far this year. author: sina.com.cn
title: 到2035年，南京港货物吞吐量有望达4亿吨|南京港_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8个板块共28项举措，海事部门推动 南京港 总规落地
到2035年，南京港货物吞吐量有望达4亿吨
南报网讯（通讯员 宁海宣 记者 吴春霞） 2024年，《南京区域性航运物流中心发展专项规划（2024—2035年）》《南京港总体规划（2024—2035年）》相继获批，标志着南京在打造区域性航运物流中心道路上迈出关键一步。为进一步推动南京港总体规划落地见效，近日，《江苏海事局支持南京区域性航运物流中心建设若干措施》（以下简称《若干措施》）正式印发，涵盖支持建设江海转运主枢纽港、推动港产城融合发展等8个板块，共28项措施。
江河海联运是南京物流运输的一大特点。为支持南京建设江海转运主枢纽港，海事部门将加大对龙潭六期、七期以及新生圩港区码头改建二期等新建、改（扩）建码头服务保障力度；针对南京高质量发展具有重大促进作用的涉水项目，采取“一事一议、特事特办”方式；提升南京港核心竞争力，指导扬子、龙潭集装箱等相关码头释放预留水工结构等级能力，将靠泊能力提升至5万—10万吨级。
航道的深度直接决定港口的竞争力。为充分挖掘长江深水航道黄金效能，海事部门将通过提升到港船舶能级、优化交通组织体系等举措，不断提升港口核心竞争力。开展船舶进出长江狭水道航行技术攻关，支持11.8米深吃水船舶进出南京港；支持在南京增设10万吨级船舶锚位，优化扩容南京长江水域锚泊资源。
2024年，南京多式联运、近洋航线稳定运行，远洋航线取得新突破。在建设水运国际物流大通道方面，海事部门将指导江盛、金陵船舶等码头有序对外开放，增加外贸出海新通道；支持南京港完善集装箱航线网络，加密沿海内贸直航航线，助力打造集装箱南京都市圈组合港；服务多式联运发展，支持南京龙潭“公铁水”多式联运中心建设，推进集装箱“一单制”“一箱制”，促进铁水联运、江海联运高效衔接。
《若干措施》还提到，海事部门将全力支持南京打造一流港航营商环境。搭建政银企对接平台，支持金融机构出台定制化航运金融服务产品，畅通航运公司融资渠道；支持出台南京籍船舶海事监管与服务母港便利政策，吸引龙头航运公司落户和优质船舶登记；推广应用海事通App，实施船舶航行类证书跨部门“一站式”集成办理。
根据南京港总体规划，到2035年，南京将全面建成区域性航运物流中心，南京港货物吞吐量达到4亿吨，集装箱吞吐量达到630万标箱，初步实现港产城一体融合发展。

author: Dawit Habtemariam
title: Meet the New Face of German Tourism: an AI Travel Influencer
text:
Tourists looking to explore Germany can expect a helping hand from the country’s first AI-generated travel influencer, which the German National Tourist Board debuted on Thursday.
Called “Emma,” the AI is an interactive brand ambassador developed to inspire potential visitors. Emma is blonde, in her 30s, and a resident of Berlin — with a passion for traveling.
“Emma’s visual appearance was intentionally designed to make her appear authentic and trustworthy as a representative of Germany. Her look blends a modern, cosmopolitan style with subtle references to German culture and architecture, such as nods to contemporary fashion and iconic German designs,” said a spokesperson for the German National Tourist Board told Skift.
Emma will share videos and images of her journeys, along with tips on her own Instagram account: @EmmaTravelsGermany . She has already begun responding to comments on Instagram and having text conversations with travelers on the tourism board’s website . Emma, who speaks over 20 languages and is available 24/7, is powered by advanced deep learning algorithms and large language models.
Testing New Tech “With the launch of Emma as an AI influencer, we are taking a further step in our digital strategy,” said Petra Hedorfer, the tourism board CEO, in a statement. “Along the customer journey, Emma can act as an innovative bridge builder between potential travelers and real, unforgettable experiences in Germany, starting from the inspiration phase.”
The German National Tourist Board developed the project in collaboration with the agency Startup Creator.
In the long run, the German National Tourist Board envisions Emma evolving from an information source into a personal travel companion capable of providing personalized travel itineraries tailored to users’ individual preferences and interests.
Emma as Brand Ambassador The German National Tourist Board envisions Emma as a key representative for Germany in the tourism industry.
“She could partner with major hotel chains, airlines, or travel agencies to offer exclusive travel deals, experiences, or discounts. Through such partnerships, Emma will not only become the face of German tourism but also a global facilitator of unique travel experiences,” said a spokesperson for the board.
However, Germany’s destination marketers may have to wait a bit longer for technology to catch up somewhat with their full ambitions.
On launch day, in Skift’s test chats with Emma, her answers were basic. When asked for suggestions for a day in Berlin, she offered a short, light itinerary, with sentences like: “In the evening, head to Prenzlauer Berg and explore Kastanienallee. For nightlife, check out Weserstrasse in Neukölln.”
Yet the tourism board said that it’s early days. Through continuous machine learning, Emma will be able to respond to users’ emotional needs, offering empathetic replies or adjusting recommendations based on travelers’ moods and preferences, said a spokesperson.
By the end of the year, the AI assistant will also be able to access not only the information on germany.travel but also to real-time data from the tourism board’s open data project GNTB Knowledge Graph.
Replacing Humans with AI Influencers On Instagram, some interpreted the launch of Emma as Germany replacing human content creators.
“It would definitely be better to promote real-life people who exist and can form real opinions! There are so many travel creators out there who love Germany, have visited, and know the best destinations. People would much rather listen and hear from real people. Please do better!” wrote user wanderwithred on Instagram .
The German National Tourist Board responded on Instagram, saying it has no plans to replace human influencers because they create “authentic and emotional connections” and that Emma will “complement” and “enrich” their contributions.
The tourism board’s influencer network generated 148 million impressions on social media last year, according to the organization.
Influencers typically have established and engaged audiences. Destination marketing organizations pay influencers to help them reach that audience.
AI’s Growth in Destination Marketing The new influencer project comes as destinations expand their investment into generative AI. Last week, Brand USA, America’s destination marketing organization, hired Janette Roush as its first chief AI officer. Roush was previously executive vice president of marketing and digital for New York City Tourism + Conventions.
In this new position, Roush will lead the organization’s AI strategy and innovation initiatives to pioneer new paths for consumer promotion, trade, and partner engagement for Brand USA.
A key objective for destinations has been to use generative AI to replace generic top 10 lists and travel guides with personalized travel recommendations. “It’s never going to be a big bang moment, but slowly things change,” said Barry Rogers, head of the Dublin City Tourism Unit, at ITB Berlin in March . “Suddenly, it might be top 10 lists and Lonely Planet articles, and then suddenly it’s AI giving you personalized itineraries.”
Dublin City Council and OpenAI announced a partnership to develop AI-powered itineraries earlier this year.
A Growing Influencer Class Attracts a Larger Piece of Destination Marketing As the social media influencer industry evolves and matures, destination marketing organizations are, in turn, taking them seriously as agents in their efforts to grow visitation.
Read More The travel industry's top event returns to Dubai. Nov. 19-20 in Dubai Register Now

author: DPA
title: China's e-car exports unlikely to grow in 2025 - NewsBreak
text:
By DPA ,
45 minutes ago
China's exports of electric cars are unlikely to grow further this year, according to a Chinese association.
Chinese car exports are expected to increase by 10% overall, said Cui Dongshu, secretary general of the industry association CPCA. However, he does not expect any growth in e-car exports.
According to the latest CPCA report, exports of e-cars and hybrid cars rose by 24.3% in 2024 compared to the previous year.
China's manufacturers exported a total of 1.29 million vehicles in these drive classes, the report stated.
A key problem for exports is the pressure from tariffs in Europe, said Cui.
The European Union - an important trading partner for China given the country's tense trade relationship with the United States - voted in favour of additional surcharges on e-cars manufactured in China last year.
Chinese brands were particularly affected.
The car industry in Germany took a critical view of this measure and feared countermeasures. Beijing responded with several anti-dumping investigations, for example against spirits or pork products.
Cui noted that another problem is that no growth is expected on the car market in Russia. Russia has become increasingly important as a sales market for Chinese manufacturers since the West imposed far-reaching sanctions on the country following its invasion of Ukraine.
A price war is still raging in the e-car segment in China, which is likely to continue in 2025, Cui said. One reason for this is that the number of vehicles has risen rapidly.
As a result, manufacturers' profit margins remain low. Many brands in China are not yet earning any money with their e-cars. The industry is expecting further consolidation.
2

author: James Morgan
title: Georgia is playing a bargain FCS opponent in Tennessee Tech
text:
The No. 1 Georgia Bulldogs are getting a bargain Football Championship Subdivision (FCS) opponent in the Tennessee Tech Golden Eagles . The University of Georgia is paying Tennessee Tech just $550,000 to play at Sanford Stadium on Saturday, Sept. 7 at 2:00 p.m. ET.
FCS teams can receive over $2 million to play against top Power Four football teams like Georgia, so the Bulldogs are getting a bargain to play against Tennessee Tech. Georgia is favored to win by over seven touchdowns.
The Georgia-Tennessee Tech game will be televised on ESPN+/SEC Network+. Georgia will look to extend its home winning streak to 26 games against the Golden Eagles.
“There are 5.9 billion people in the world and there’s a tiny, tiny percentage of them that can ever say they had the opportunity to play the best in the
world at their sport, at their age group,” said Tennessee Tech head coach Bobby Wilder. “Which is what we have the opportunity to do this weekend.”
More Football Tennessee Tech vs. No. 1 Georgia football key players Rece Davis updates his top 10 college football rankings What Tennessee Tech's coach said about facing Georgia This is a big chance to Tennessee Tech to get some national exposure. Georgia will look to pile points on the Golden Eagles and get back ups some opportunities, but Tennessee Tech will have a lot of motivation against Georgia.

author: @wcjb20
title: ‘I really like hurricanes’: 10-year-old storm chaser in Ocala documents hurricanes online
text: ‘I really like hurricanes’: 10-year-old storm chaser in Ocala documents hurricanes online OCALA, Fla. (WCJB) - A young boy isn’t staying inside during hurricanes. He’s outside recording them. 10-year-old Jayden Lew documented his experience during Hurricane Milton on his YouTube channel, [Jayden Lee’s World.](https://www.youtube.com/@jaydenleesworld8387/featured) While most people would shelter inside their home, this kid says he’s not afraid. “Unless a tree starts falling, then I will get scared, or if shingles came off because then my window might pop open,” said Lew. “But other than that, I really like hurricanes and I enjoy them.” TRENDING: [Marion County residents continue recovering after Hurricane Milton](https://www.wcjb.com/2024/10/11/marion-county-residents-continue-recovering-after-hurricane-milton/) Milton wasn’t his first storm either. He covered Hurricane Ian two years ago, along with Tropical Storm Nicole, and Hurricane Helene a few weeks back. This fifth grader does all the recording, but says he gets some help from self-proclaimed ‘momager’ Cheryl Reith. “He has to take a look at everything and tell me hey this is okay, this lettering is okay, those graphics are okay,” said Reith. “I always get the approval from him before I’m allowed to post anything.” Jayden says he likes feeling the wind and rain, and knows how to make good content by watching the storms outside. “I might be like a hurricane hunter, flying for the storms cause the eye looks really cool and you get to feel the wind,” he continued. “In front of you, all you see is all that gray wind and rain, so I would like to fly for that.” It’s an interest this kid picked up from his mom, who says she loves watching storms and making memories with her son. “We were out here filming this so we were getting pounded with rain, we were cold, we were wet, we were getting blown away, but it was so fun,” said Reith. You can check out his Hurricane Milton video by clicking [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pc9h7UJ3lRg). [Click here](https://www.wcjb.com/newsletter/) to subscribe to our newsletter. Copyright 2024 WCJB. All rights reserved.

author: Baglamukhi
title: How bhairav can Save You Time, Stress, and Money.
text:

It is actually believed that considering that toddlers Have got a weaker energy industry, These are additional at risk of evil eye.
In keeping with A different legend, Shiva himself designed Bhairava. There was a horrible demon named Dahurasuran. Immediately after intense penance, he acquired a boon that he could possibly be killed only by a woman. Parvati then took the shape of Kali to slay him. Soon after satisfying her mission, her wrath took the form of a youngster. Kali fed her child together with her milk. Looking at all this, Shiva emerged there and manufactured both of those Kali and the child to merge into him. From this kind of Bhairava, Shiva appeared in all his 8 manifestations of Ashtanga Bhairavas.
Kalabhairava is one of the varieties of Lord Shiva, as per Hindu mythology. However, this avatar of Lord Shiva is intense and harmful. He is the one particular deity who keeps his devotees clear of materialistic items such as greed, lust, jealousy or lust.
Because of this, any individual with any religious affiliations and beliefs can still reap the benefits of their proficient means of Vedic Knowledge.
कालभैरवाष्टकं पठंति ये मनोहरं ज्ञानमुक्तिसाधनं विचित्रपुण्यवर्धनम् । शोकमोहदैन्यलोभकोपतापनाशनं प्रयान्ति कालभैरवांघ्रिसन्निधिं नरा ध्रुवम् ॥९॥
He is the giver of wealth and prosperity. Followers feel that praying to this type on Tuesdays, grants them speedy and powerful outcomes. Some texts explain him as having thirty-two palms, golden complexion, terrible enamel and the shape of the bird. He is demonstrated having a human type earlier mentioned the hip. It is said that worshipping him aids his devotees demolish their enemies. Bhairava Ashtami
शूलटङ्कपाशदण्डपाणिमादिकारणं श्यामकायमादिदेवमक्षरं निरामयम् । भीमविक्रमं प्रभुं विचित्रताण्डवप्रियं काशिकापुराधिनाथकालभैरवं भजे ॥३॥
Lord Aakash Bhairav, the 'god of the sky', can also be regarded by Nepalese as being a progenitor from the Maharjan caste, Particularly the peasant groups.
Bhairava is also known as upon as protector, as he guards the eight directions with the universe. In Shiva temples, in the event the temple is closed, the keys are positioned ahead of Bhairava.
There are actually fascinating legends with regard to the origin of Bhairava. Based on one of these, at the time, Lord Brahma, the God of creation way too was owning 5 heads, similar to Lord Shiva. He grew to become a bit arrogant on account of this attribute, commenced getting himself as equal to Shiva in all respects and commenced considering self as the ultimate source of all creations. Also holding himself as being the supreme Almighty, he begun anticipating Everybody else to worship him. Shiva recognized what was taking place and felt that it's time that Brahma is demonstrated his spot for The nice of the universe. It really is then that he then took the fierce kind of Bhairava and plucked out considered one of Brahma’s heads.
When you are dealing with house disputes and various problems connected with getting residence, then the best option is to seek divine blessings of lord batuk bhairav. Lord batuk bhairav Puja and Yajna is a very effective and comprehensive Puja working with which disputes relevant to ancestral assets and other problems related to it can be solved in one’s favor.
भुक्तिमुक्तिदायकं प्रशस्तचारुविग्रहं भक्तवत्सलं स्थितं समस्तलोकविग्रहम् । विनिक्वणन्मनोज्ञहेमकिङ्किणीलसत्कटिं काशिकापुराधिनाथकालभैरवं भजे ॥४॥
धर्मसेतुपालकं त्वधर्ममार्गनाशकं कर्मपाशमोचकं सुशर्मदायकं विभुम् । स्वर्णवर्णशेषपाशशोभिताङ्गमण्डलं काशिकापुराधिनाथकालभैरवं भजे ॥५॥
